title: cannot download league of legends
body: network error message pops up everytime i try to install it again could anyone help?

replies.body:
Heya, you might be getting blocked from reaching the patching server.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and see if auto-configuring your firewall settings with could help here.  

Additional steps are also available in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to continue helping to rule out possibilities.
ive downloaded what you just gave me but i cannot open it either a message from windows installer pops up
Just curious, are you at home or are you at like a school. (do you have control over the network or some network Admin)
at home and no i dont have control over though i rebooted my computer and hopefully it works now
Hey there, are you able to right click the tool and Run As Administrator?  This could help, but let me know.
